product_name: Boardworks B-Ray Stand Up Paddle Board with Paddle - 10' 6"
long_description: Offering plenty of width and stability for the entry-level paddler, the B-Ray has a soft top and rails for extra comfort, safety and durability, making it the ideal board the whole family.
short_description: Offering plenty of width and stability for the entry-level paddler, the B-Ray has a soft top and rails for extra comfort, safety and durability, making it the ideal board the whole family.
